definition: Guta district of Jinzhou city 錦州市|锦州市, Liaoning
Guta district of Jinzhou city 錦州市|锦州市, Liaoning

sentences.english: The ancient tower still stops up,exposed to the weather for ages.
sentences.chinese: 经过长年累月的风吹日晒，那座古塔依然竖立在那里。

sentences.english: There is no more I can tell you about that ancient tower.
sentences.chinese: 关于那座古塔的传闻我已经全告诉您了。

sentences.english: The ancient pagodas are very valuable cultural relics, they are worth good protection.
sentences.chinese: 这些古塔是非常珍贵的文物，值得妥善保护。

sentences.english: Many tourists puffed up the steep steps of the ancient pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 许多旅游者喘着气登上古塔陡直的梯级。

sentences.english: Ancient pagodas appeared in Shanghai region along with the introduction of Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 随着佛教的传入，上海地区也出现古塔建筑。

sentences.english: The ancient pagoda dates back more than 1000 years.
sentences.chinese: 这座古塔始建于1000多年前。

sentences.english: The magnificent view of the ancient pagoda dissolved in mist .
sentences.chinese: 那古塔雄伟的景色在雾中消失了。

sentences.english: There were stairs leading to the top, but Diana and Peter decided to take the lift.
sentences.chinese: 古塔有楼梯直通塔顶，但戴安娜和彼特决定乘坐电梯。

sentences.english: In all of China's ancient towers, Wenfeng tower is unique.
sentences.chinese: 文峰塔在中国古塔中是独一无二的。

sentences.english: An ancient pagoda frowns on the mountainside.
sentences.chinese: 一座古塔阴森森地矗立在山腰上。

sentences.english: Many tourists pulled up the steep steps of the ancient pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 许多旅游者喘着气登上了古塔的陡峭的梯级。

sentences.english: The ancient pagoda stood out in relief against the dawn.
sentences.chinese: 那座古塔在晨曦的辉映下轮廓分外鲜明。

sentences.english: The ancient pagoda is undergoing repairs.

definition: stupa/tower venerating the ashes of the Buddha
abbr. for Syria 敘利亞|叙利亚[Xu4 li4 ya4]
places of historic interest/historical sites/CL:個|个[ge4]
